      • getCallURL

        public java.lang.String getCallURL()

      • getBaseCallPreviousPath

        public java.lang.String getBaseCallPreviousPath(Event event,
                                                Event previousEvent,
                                                boolean prevDateAllowed)
        Builds the url used to calculate eventual previous paths related to a specified event: the function requires also the previous event.
        Parameters:
        event - event of which calculate previous path.
        previousEvent - previous event.
        prevDateAllowed - boolean that indicates if the ending time of previous event is in the past.
        Returns:
        the base url for a generic calculation of previous paths.

      • getBaseCallFollowingPath

        public java.lang.String getBaseCallFollowingPath(Event event,
                                                 Event followingEvent,
                                                 boolean prevDateAllowed)
        Builds the url used to calculate eventual following paths related to a specified event: the function requires also the following event.
        Parameters:
        event - event of which calculate previous path.
        followingEvent - following event.
        prevDateAllowed - boolean that indicates if the ending time of the event is in the past.
        Returns:
        the base url for a generic calculation of following paths.

      • getCallWithNoTransit

        public java.lang.String getCallWithNoTransit(java.lang.String tempCall,
                                             TravelMeanEnum type)
        Concatenates the private travel mean required in the call to google mpas APIs.
        Parameters:
        tempCall - base call obtained from other functions of the class
        type - key word to specify the private mean to use for the path calculation.
        Returns:
        a url ready for the request to google maps with a specified private travel mean.

      • getCallByTransit

        public java.lang.String getCallByTransit(java.lang.String tempCall,
                                         java.util.List<TravelMeanEnum> transitMeans)
        Concatenates all the public travel means required in the call to google mpas APIs.
        Parameters:
        tempCall - base call obtained from other functions of the class
        transitMeans - a list that specify all the public means to use for the path calculation.
        Returns:
        a url ready for the request to google maps with the specified public travel means.

      • addParam

        private void addParam(java.lang.String param,
                      java.lang.String address)
        Concatenates a parameter to the url.
        Parameters:
        param - parameter to concatenate in the URL.
        address - value of the parameter added.

      • baseCall

        private void baseCall()
        Creates the base call that is used in any direction call made by Travlendar+.
